resources.string: "Change values of framework-res.apk. Tap here to configure settings."
Show text beside icon on action bar
Turn off LED when charge completed
Make notification drawer icon bg transparent
Show description of the icon on action bar.
Turn off LED when charging is completely finished.
"Don\'t turn on screen automatically when you start/stop charging."
Disable warning when you turn up the volume with headphone connected.\nBe careful not to turn up too high.
Disable sound when you change the volume.
"Don\'t restore network mode when you change the network."
You can change brightness to 10 in Display settings.
"Disable \"Choose input method\" notification when you type texts."
Change color of icon background of notification drawer to transparent.
Fix cell standby problem on data only SIM.
Disable force auto-rotation in desk/car dock mode.
Show menu key in lock screen
Don\'t hide menu key in lock screen.
Show shutter sound setting in camera.
"Experimental, I don't know if it really works."
Reduce auto brightnesss levels by half.
For Japanese language only. Change translation for power menu.
Fix Japanese translation for Z3 [Alt ver]
For Japanese language only. Change translation for power menu.
Prevent inserting spaces before and after words when you paste it.
Option for selecting frequency band of Wi-Fi will be shown in Wi-Fi settings.
You may need to reboot for changes to take effect.
